name: Shadow Blade
summary: Shadow Blade is a fast-paced ninja platforming game for iPad/iPhone and Android devices (including Ouya), from Dead Mage Game Studio. It features intuitive touch controls and an array of weapons and challenging levels. Shadow Blade: Reload is the enhanced version of the game for PC that includes a full level editor to create and share levels. Becoming a ninja is at your fingertips!
